entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The organization responsible for distributing Common Stock and satisfying Tax-Related Items according to the Global Restricted Stock Unit Agreement.

entities.name: SERVICE RECIPIENT
entities.description: Entity that receives services and may withhold or sell Common Stock to satisfy Tax-Related Items.

entities.name: SWITZERLAND
entities.description: Country where the offer of the Award is considered a private offering and is not subject to registration.

entities.name: FINSA
entities.description: Swiss Federal Act on Financial Services governing the offer of the Award.

entities.name: FINMA
entities.description: Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority overseeing financial regulations.

entities.name: TAIWAN
entities.description: Country where the offer of participation in the Plan is available only for Consultants, Directors, and Employees of the Company and its Affiliates.

entities.name: THAILAND
entities.description: Country with specific exchange control information, requiring repatriation of funds from sale of shares or payment of dividends.

entities.name: TURKEY
entities.description: Country where the Award is made available only to Employees or Consultants as a private offering.

entities.name: UKRAINE
entities.description: Country with exchange control regulations for acquiring and selling shares of Common Stock under the Plan.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company and the Service Recipient both have the authority to withhold or sell shares of Common Stock to satisfy Tax-Related Items.
The offer of the Award in Switzerland is governed by the Swiss Federal Act on Financial Services (FinSA).
FINMA is the regulatory authority that oversees compliance with FinSA.
In Taiwan, the offer of participation in the Plan is available only for Consultants, Directors, and Employees of the Company and its Affiliates.
In Thailand, individuals must comply with exchange control regulations when dealing with shares of Common Stock issued by the Company.
In Turkey, the Award is made available only to Employees or Consultants of the Company as a private offering.
In Ukraine, individuals must comply with exchange control regulations when acquiring and selling shares of Common Stock issued by the Company.
